item.title: Rubbish left for 5 weeks, 24th December
item.description:
I took a photo on the 17th of November 2025 of this rubbish and it is still here now on the 24th of December 2025. I am not sure why somebody from phoenix hasn't cleaned it or Lewisham council. It's a discarded car mat.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swiftsden Way, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Volkswagen parking badly again. . ., 24th December
item.description:
This company. . .they are either parking on the bend blocking traffic where there's double yellow lines or their parking here at Avondale road on double yellows making it difficult for to pull out from the side road. The double yellows are their fit a reason. This is like the 3rd occasion I'd have report them parking there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars continuously park on the double yellow line blocking cars and making it extremely difficult to exit, 24th December
item.description:
This is an ongoing problem. It has been reported to the council how ever nothing has been done. Owgan close e-dl is an unmanned parking zone where cars illegally park on the double yellow line. It’s always the same cars. Silver ford fiesta. White Audi. Red Nissan duke. And battered silver Honda. The last three cars all being from the same household.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Owgan Close, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect temporary roadsigns on Graham Rd, 24th December
item.description:
Several signs put up a couple of weeks ago are showing incorrect dates and incorrect information. Wilton Way has not been closed and is not closed. Please fix.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No Insurance no Tax, 24th December
item.description:
The car was parked up a few weeks ago. Checked car details it has no tax or insurance. Smashed down drivers side. Reg OU63LBO
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Avenue, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urine in the lift/no cleaners, 23rd December
item.description:
There is a serious ongoing hygiene issue. Urine is found in the communal lift at least twice a week. In the latest incident, urine was present from Wednesday and was only cleaned by a resident on 23/12/25 because no council cleaners attended

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodberry Down Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy and loose drain cover in the road., 23rd December
item.description:
There are two drain covers in the southbound side of the road right outside the entrance to the Thames Water site. The drain cover nearest to the Thames water site entrance clacks very loudly and visibly moves when the wheels of a vehicle run across the drain cover.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Station Road, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
